com.here.android.mpa.prefetcher

Class MapDataPrefetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.prefetcher.MapDataPrefetcher

  • public final class MapDataPrefetcher
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to prefetch map data for an area of interest. This is similar to the MapLoader except the map data of interest is specified by a GeoBoundingBox or Route, rather than MapPackages. This allows scenarios such as guidance to work in a specific area reliably even though the network might be offline at that time.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MapDataPrefetcher.Adapter
      Default implementation for the MapDataPrefetcher.Listener interface.
      static interface  MapDataPrefetcher.Listener
      This interface receives notifications from MapDataPrefetcher that indicates the progress for loading the map data and the result if the cache was successfully purged.
      static class  MapDataPrefetcher.Request
      An object that is returned from a request to fetch map data.

    • Method Detail

      • cancelRequest

        public void cancelRequest(int requestId)
        Cancel the prefetch request. On cancelling a request, the prefetcher will notify the listeners with the status PREFETCH_CANCELLED. See MapDataPrefetcher.Listener.onStatus(int, MapDataPrefetcher.Listener.PrefetchStatus).
        Parameters:
        requestId - Id for the prefetcher request. Request ids less than 0 are invalid.

      • cancelAllRequests

        public void cancelAllRequests()
        Cancel all pending prefetch requests. On cancelling a request, the prefetcher will notify the listeners with the status PREFETCH_CANCELLED. See MapDataPrefetcher.Listener.onStatus(int, MapDataPrefetcher.Listener.PrefetchStatus).

      • fetchMapData

        public MapDataPrefetcher.Request fetchMapData(GeoBoundingBox area)
        Prefetch the map data for an area bounded by a box. While fetching valid requests, the prefetcher will notify callbacks:
        • onProgressNotification - multiple times.
        • onStatusNotification - during the duration of the fetch with the PREFETCH_IN_PROGRESS.
        • onStatusNotification - when the fetch ended with a PrefetchStatus of PREFETCH_SUCCESS, PREFETCH_FAILURE or PREFETCH_CANCELLED.

        See MapDataPrefetcher.Listener.

        The same data groups as MapLoader are fetched by MapDataPrefetcher. To specify which data groups to fetch: See MapLoader.selectDataGroup(MapPackage.SelectableDataGroup) See MapLoader.deselectDataGroup(MapPackage.SelectableDataGroup)

        Parameters:
        area - Area to fetch map data for.
        Returns:
        Request for the area.

      • fetchMapData

        public MapDataPrefetcher.Request fetchMapData(Route route,
                                              int radius)
        Prefetch the map data for around a route. While fetching valid requests, the prefetcher will notify callbacks:
        • onProgressNotification - multiple times.
        • onStatusNotification - during the duration of the fetch with the PREFETCH_IN_PROGRESS.
        • onStatusNotification - when the fetch as ended with a PrefetchStatus of PREFETCH_SUCCESS, PREFETCH_FAILURE or PREFETCH_CANCELLED.

        See MapDataPrefetcher.Listener.

        The same data groups as MapLoader are fetched by MapDataPrefetcher. To specify which data groups to fetch: See MapLoader.selectDataGroup(MapPackage.SelectableDataGroup) See MapLoader.deselectDataGroup(MapPackage.SelectableDataGroup)

        Not supported by Transit and UrbanMobility routes. An error code of INVALID_PARAMETERS will be returned instead.

        Parameters:
        route - Route to fetch map data around.
        radius - Distance around route to fetch map data for in meters. Data is fetched as a series of circular areas with their centers along the route with the specified radius. The absolute minimum distance is 500m, otherwise, INVALID_PARAMETERS will be returned.
        Returns:
        Request for the route.

      • estimateMapDataSize

        public MapDataPrefetcher.Request estimateMapDataSize(GeoBoundingBox area)
        Estimates the data size for fetching the map data for an area bounded by a box. When the data size estimation is completed, the prefetcher will notify the listeners with the size in KB if successful.

        See MapDataPrefetcher.Listener.onDataSizeEstimated(int, boolean, long).

        The same data groups as MapLoader are fetched by MapDataPrefetcher and is the same data groups used for the estimation. To specify which data groups to fetch: See MapLoader.selectDataGroup(MapPackage.SelectableDataGroup) See MapLoader.deselectDataGroup(MapPackage.SelectableDataGroup)

        Parameters:
        area - The Area to fetch map data for.
        Returns:
        Request for the size estimatation for the area. An error code of OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED is returned when a shared disk cache is in use.

      • estimateMapDataSize

        public MapDataPrefetcher.Request estimateMapDataSize(Route route,
                                                     int radius)
        Estimates the data size for fetching the map data around the route. When the data size estimation is completed, the prefetcher will notify the listeners with the size in KB if successful.

        See MapDataPrefetcher.Listener.onDataSizeEstimated(int, boolean, long).

        The same data groups as MapLoader are fetched by MapDataPrefetcher and is the same data groups used for the estimation. To specify which data groups to fetch: See MapLoader.selectDataGroup(MapPackage.SelectableDataGroup) See MapLoader.deselectDataGroup(MapPackage.SelectableDataGroup)

        Not supported by Transit and UrbanMobility routes. An error code of INVALID_PARAMETERS will be returned instead.

        Parameters:
        route - Route to fetch map data around.
        radius - Distance around route to fetch map data for in meters. Data is fetched as a series of circular areas with their centers along the route with the specified radius. The absolute minimum distance is 500m, otherwise, INVALID_PARAMETERS will be returned.
        Returns:
        Request for the size estimation for the route. An error code of OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED is returned when a shared disk cache is in use.

      • clearMapDataCache

        public void clearMapDataCache()
        Clears any cached map data that has been prefetched or downloaded automatically by MapView that is currently not in use. This doesn't include MapPackages downloaded by MapLoader. The MapDataPrefetcher will notify the listeners if clear was successful or not.

        NOTE: Map data cannot be purged when a shared disk cache is in use.

        See MapDataPrefetcher.Listener.onCachePurged(boolean).

      • addListener

        public void addListener(MapDataPrefetcher.Listener listener)
        Add a listener to the prefetcher.
        Parameters:
        listener - Any events for any requests will be passed to this listeners.

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(MapDataPrefetcher.Listener listener)
        Remove a listener from the prefetcher.
        Parameters:
        listener - The progress listener to be removed.

      • getInstance

        public static MapDataPrefetcher getInstance()
        Returns the instance of the MapDataPrefetcher.
        Returns:
        instance of the MapDataPrefetcher.
